title: Story Generator
description: A single-page application that generates creative stories based on user prompts with customizable story elements

pages.name: Home
pages.purpose: Main interface for users to input prompts and view generated stories

ui_components: Prompt input area with text editor
Story settings panel with genre, length, and tone selectors
Story display area with formatted text
Story history sidebar with previous generations
state: storyHistory: array of {id, prompt, timestamp, story}
interactions: User types in prompt input field
User selects story genre from dropdown
User selects story length from radio buttons
User selects story tone from checkboxes
System displays loading state while processing
User clicks Copy to Clipboard button
User clicks Download as PDF button
User selects previous story from history
User clears current prompt and starts new story
acceptance_criteria: Prompt input accepts text of up to 500 characters
Generated stories are at least 300 words
Copy to clipboard functionality works across browsers
PDF download generates properly formatted document
Responsive design works on mobile and desktop
Error messages display clearly for invalid inputs
Loading state provides user feedback during generation
All UI components are keyboard accessible
